DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the current trial is to establish the bioequivalence of 2 hyoscine butylbromide dose forms following oral administration.
DOC.brief_title: Relative Bioavailability Study to Investigate and to Compare Two Different Formulations of Hyoscine Butylbromide in Healthy Male and Female Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male and female subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
